casebody.data:
Rufus McKAY, as Owner of The Coal Boat HELDERBERG, Appellant, v. The CITY OF NEW YORK, Appellee. No. 439. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 27, 1933. William F. Purdy, of New York City (Frank C. Mason, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Arthur J. W. Hilly, Corp. Counsel, of New York City (Charles J. Carroll, of Brooklyn, N. Y., and John T. Condon, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
